item.title: [Rs377d] Hint icon packet
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

Description: Adding the hint icon packet onto a 377.
Assumed Knowledge: How to read.
Tested Server: Rs377d.
Files/Classes modified: ActionSender.
Files/Classes added:

/** * Creates an arrow over an npcs or players head. * @param type The type. 10 for player 1 for npc. * @param id The id of the npc or player. * @return The action sender instance, for chanining. */ public ActionSender createArrow(int type, int id) { Rs2PacketBuilder bldr = new Rs2PacketBuilder(199); bldr.put((byte) type); bldr.putShort(id); bldr.putTriByte(0); player.getSession().write(bldr.toPacket()); return this; }

Result:

29o4vbc.jpg767×553

Read full topic
